About me

First of everything, my name is Matheus and I'm from Brazil.

I've 18 years and I'm a tech lover since I was a little kid

I started into tech world, because my brother. He knew how to fix computers and do some cool things on computer, and it inspired me to do the same.

Since jan/2014 I'm studying about web development.

I'm currently working on Gasoline Digital.
